name: Shivangi Vashishtha
about: Experienced Designer with a demonstrated history of working in the retail industry. Strong arts and design professional with a Bachelor's degree focused in Fashion/Apparel Design from Pearl Academy. Skilled in Trend Analysis, Event Management, Editing, Draping, and Team Building.
